channel.title: Alert does not change from unknown status
channel.description:
Hi there, I created an alert with a scheduled query, result of the query already exceeded threshold but status has no changed. Could you help me with this issue.
![image|476x444](upload://fS11qOn6sBILEyG9QS85dXMMj3.png)
